name: bytepluscc
description: A Pulumi package to safely use randomness in Pulumi programs.
attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`bytepluscc` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/byteplus/terraform-provider-bytepluscc).

nodejs.packageDescription: A Pulumi package to safely use randomness in Pulumi programs.
nodejs.readme:
> This provider is a derived work of the [Terraform Provider](https://github.com/byteplus/terraform-provider-bytepluscc)
> distributed under [MPL 2.0](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/MPL/2.0/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,
> first check the [`pulumi-bytepluscc` repo](https://github.com/byteplus/pulumi-bytepluscc/issues); however, if that doesn't turn up anything,
> please consult the source [`terraform-provider-bytepluscc` repo](https://github.com/byteplus/terraform-provider-bytepluscc/issues).

python.readme:
> This provider is a derived work of the [Terraform Provider](https://github.com/byteplus/terraform-provider-bytepluscc)
> distributed under [MPL 2.0](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/MPL/2.0/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,
> first check the [`pulumi-bytepluscc` repo](https://github.com/byteplus/pulumi-bytepluscc/issues); however, if that doesn't turn up anything,
> please consult the source [`terraform-provider-bytepluscc` repo](https://github.com/byteplus/terraform-provider-bytepluscc/issues).

accessKey.description:
The Access Key for Byteplus Provider. It must be provided, but it can also be sourced from the `BYTEPLUS_ACCESS_KEY`
environment variable

assumeRole.description: An `assume_role` block (documented below). Only one `assume_role` block may be in the configuration.

customerHeaders.description:
CUSTOMER HEADERS for Byteplus Provider. The customer_headers field uses commas (,) to separate multiple headers, and
colons (:) to separate each header key from its corresponding value.

endpoints.description: An `endpoints` block (documented below). Only one `endpoints` block may be in the configuration.

region.description:
The Region for Byteplus Provider. It must be provided, but it can also be sourced from the `BYTEPLUS_REGION` environment
variable

secretKey.description:
he Secret Key for Byteplus Provider. It must be provided, but it can also be sourced from the `BYTEPLUS_SECRET_KEY`
environment variable

assumeRoleTrn.description: he TRN of the role to assume.

durationSeconds.description: The duration of the session when making the AssumeRole call. Its value ranges from 900 to 43200(seconds), and default is 3600 seconds.

policy.description: A more restrictive policy when making the AssumeRole call

cloudcontrolapi.description: Use this to override the default Cloud Control API service endpoint URL

sts.description: Use this to override the default STS service endpoint URL

detectionStatus.description: 检测状态。可以选择Finished（已完成）、Processing（处理中）类型。

riskLevel.description: 风险等级。若该参数返回值为空，表示无风险。

volumeKind.description: 云盘种类。system：系统盘。data：数据盘。

policy.description: A more restrictive policy when making the AssumeRole call

provider.description:
The provider type for the bytepluscc package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.

accessKey.description:
The Access Key for Byteplus Provider. It must be provided, but it can also be sourced from the `BYTEPLUS_ACCESS_KEY`
environment variable

assumeRole.description: An `assume_role` block (documented below). Only one `assume_role` block may be in the configuration.

customerHeaders.description:
CUSTOMER HEADERS for Byteplus Provider. The customer_headers field uses commas (,) to separate multiple headers, and
colons (:) to separate each header key from its corresponding value.

endpoints.description: An `endpoints` block (documented below). Only one `endpoints` block may be in the configuration.

region.description:
The Region for Byteplus Provider. It must be provided, but it can also be sourced from the `BYTEPLUS_REGION` environment
variable

secretKey.description:
he Secret Key for Byteplus Provider. It must be provided, but it can also be sourced from the `BYTEPLUS_SECRET_KEY`
environment variable

environment variable

architecture.description: 镜像的架构类型。可以选择amd64（x86计算）、arm64（ARM计算）类型。

bootMode.description: 镜像的启动模式。可以选择BIOS、UEFI类型。

description.description: 镜像描述。必须以字母、汉字开头。只能包含中文、字母、数字、下划线“_”、中划线“-”、等号“=”、英文逗号“,”、英文句号“.”、中文逗号“，”、中文句号“。”和空格。长度限制为0～255个字符。不填默认为空。

imageName.description: 镜像名称。必须以字母、汉字开头。只能包含中文、字母、数字、下划线“_”、中划线“-”、英文句号“.”。长度限制为1 ~ 128个字符。

instanceId.description: 实例ID。本参数与SnapshotId、SnapshotGroupId参数，三选一必填。

isInstallRunCommandAgent.description: 镜像中是否安装了云助手Agent。

isLts.description: 公共镜像是否长期维护。

licenseType.description: 镜像许可证类型。VolcanoEngine：默认，根据您设置的platform，采用火山引擎官方渠道的许可证。BYOL：自带许可证（BYOL）。

platform.description: 镜像操作系统的发行版本。可以选择CentOS、Debian、veLinux、Windows Server、Fedora、OpenSUSE、Ubuntu。

projectName.description: 资源所属项目。调用接口账号若仅拥有部分项目权限时必须传入有权限的项目信息。

shareStatus.description: 镜像共享状态。HasShared：自定义镜像已被共享给其他用户。当自定义镜像未被共享或使用公共镜像时，ShareStatus返回为空。

snapshotGroupId.description: 快照一致性组ID，表示使用快照一致性组创建自定义镜像。本参数与SnapshotId、InstanceId参数，三选一必填。

snapshotId.description: 系统盘快照ID，表示使用系统盘快照创建自定义镜像。本参数与InstanceId、SnapshotGroupId参数，三选一必填。

visibility.description: 镜像的可见性。public：公共镜像。private：私有镜像。shared：共享镜像。

bootMode.description: 镜像的启动模式。可以选择BIOS、UEFI类型。

description.description: 镜像描述。必须以字母、汉字开头。只能包含中文、字母、数字、下划线“_”、中划线“-”、等号“=”、英文逗号“,”、英文句号“.”、中文逗号“，”、中文句号“。”和空格。长度限制为0～255个字符。不填默认为空。

imageName.description: 镜像名称。必须以字母、汉字开头。只能包含中文、字母、数字、下划线“_”、中划线“-”、英文句号“.”。长度限制为1 ~ 128个字符。

instanceId.description: 实例ID。本参数与SnapshotId、SnapshotGroupId参数，三选一必填。
